<!channel> I am going to update a single project-- Omar Iman's, it's the shortest-- with new image sizes and using quality set to 85 instead of 100. If we feel good about that we can proceed with updating all the project images and author headshots. This means Live, Love, Refugee will break on the staging site until we update the front end to use the data model for the new images. Sound like a decent plan?
Thanks!

<!channel>: I emailed Magnum president Susan Meiselas earlier today on unrelated stuff, BUT...

She reiterated how happy their whole team has been on this. While there's no details yet, she also added "we'd love to talk with you about some more projects coming up".
